revised_title: Julius Vitalis' Epitaph and the History of the XXth Legion
tldr: This article discusses an ancient inscription found relating to Julius Vitalis and the XXth Legion, providing historical context and insights into the Roman presence in Britain. The author explores the history of the legion, its role in spreading Roman influence and knowledge, and the significance of inscriptions as valuable historical sources.
